alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Guernsey; Harrison; Monroe; Noble; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 7:51PM EDT until June 08 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Harrison County in east central Ohio... Guernsey County in east central Ohio... Northwestern Monroe County in east central Ohio... Western Belmont County in east central Ohio... South central Tuscarawas County in east central Ohio... Northeastern Noble County in east central Ohio... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 751 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Byesville, or 10 miles west of Barnesville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Cambridge, Barnesville, Woodsfield, Caldwell, Freeport, Byesville, Bethesda, Antrim, Quaker City, Senecaville, Belmont, and Pleasant City. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for east central Ohio. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.

area.areaDesc: Belmont; Guernsey; Harrison; Monroe; Noble; Tuscarawas
